app.name: Cap
app.version.card.title: Cap - aniBullet Local Edition
app.version.label: Version
app.version.card.subtitle: Professional tool optimized for local recording
feedback.title: Feedback & Support
feedback.description: Get help and support for Cap aniBullet Edition.
feedback.project.home.description: Visit the aniBullet edition GitHub repository to submit issues or view source code.
feedback.original.community.description: For questions about the original Cap project, join the official Discord.
feedback.debug.logs.description: Export your debug logs to a file. This can help diagnose issues. No personal information is included.
settings.title: Settings
settings.general.title: General Settings
general.app.dock.description: Show Cap in the dock even when there are no windows available to close
general.app.notifications.description: Show system notifications for events like copying to clipboard, saving files, and more. You may need to manually allow Cap access via your system's notification settings
experimental.title: Experimental Features
experimental.description: These features are still in development and may not work as expected
experimental.cursor.capture: Custom cursor capture in Studio Mode
experimental.cursor.capture.description: Studio Mode recordings will capture cursor state separately for customisation (size, smoothing) in the editor. Currently experimental as cursor events may not be captured accurately
experimental.native.camera.description: Show the camera preview using a native GPU surface instead of rendering it within the webview. This is not functional on certain Windows systems so your mileage may vary
experimental.auto.zoom.description: Automatically generate zoom segments around mouse clicks during Studio Mode recordings. This helps highlight important interactions in your recordings
general.project.name.help.intro: Use placeholders in your template that will be automatically filled in
general.project.name.help.target.name: The name of the monitor or the title of the app depending on the recording mode
general.project.name.help.custom.intro: You can also use a custom format for time. The placeholders are case-sensitive. For 24-hour time, use
general.recording.resolution.description: Choose the maximum resolution for Instant Mode recordings
general.recording.start.behavior.descrip: The main window recording start behaviour
general.recording.delete.behavior.descri: Should Cap reopen after deleting an in progress recording?
general.recording.delete.instant: Delete instant mode recordings after upload
general.recording.delete.instant.descrip: After finishing an instant recording, should Cap will delete it from your device?
general.recording.crash.recovery.descrip: Records in fragmented segments that can be recovered if the app crashes or your system loses power. May have slightly higher storage usage during recording
general.recording.fps.description: Maximum framerate for screen capture. Higher values may cause instability on some systems
general.recording.fps.warning: ⚠️ Higher framerates may cause frame drops or increased CPU usage on some systems
general.recording.auto.open.description: Whether Cap should automatically open instant recordings in your browser
general.advanced.server.description: This setting should only be changed if you are self hosting your own instance of Cap Web
general.project.name: Default project name
general.project.name.description: Customize the naming template for recording files
general.project.name.target.name.descrip: The name of the monitor or the title of the app depending on the recording mode
general.project.name.custom.description: You can also use a custom format for time. The placeholders are case-sensitive. For 24-hour time, use
general.excluded.windows.description: Automatically hide these windows during recording
general.excluded.windows.note.descriptio: On Windows, excluded windows require a recording restart to take effect.
general.excluded.windows.add.description: Select a window to hide during recording
recording.mode.info.instant: Quick Save - Record and save directly, skip editing
recording.mode.info.studio: Full Edit - Record, edit, and share
recording.mode.info.instant.detail: Save recording directly to specified path after completion, skipping the editing step
recording.mode.info.studio.detail: Record locally in the highest quality for editing later with effects and transitions
recording.mode.info.screenshot.detail: Capture and annotate screenshots instantly for quick documentation
main.overlay.recordings.empty.title: No recordings yet
main.overlay.recordings.empty.descriptio: Your screen recordings will appear here. Start recording to get started!
main.overlay.screenshots.empty.title: No screenshots yet
main.overlay.screenshots.empty.descripti: Your screenshots will appear here. Take a screenshot to get started!
editor.video.delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this recording?
editor.screenshot.delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this screenshot?
recording.area.select.hint: Click and drag to select an area
main.device.systemAudio.unsupported: System audio capture requires macOS 13.0 or later
hotkeys.title: Shortcuts
hotkeys.description: Configure system-wide keyboard shortcuts to control Cap
experimental.title: Experimental Features
experimental.description: These features are still in development and may not work as expected.
experimental.cursor.capture.label: Custom cursor capture in Studio Mode
experimental.cursor.capture.description: Studio Mode recordings will capture cursor state separately for customisation (size, smoothing) in the editor. Currently experimental as cursor events may not be captured accurately.
experimental.native.camera.label: Native camera preview
experimental.native.camera.description: Show the camera preview using a native GPU surface instead of rendering it within the webview. This is not functional on certain Windows systems so your mileage may vary.
experimental.auto.zoom.label: Auto zoom on clicks
experimental.auto.zoom.description: Automatically generate zoom segments around mouse clicks during Studio Mode recordings. This helps highlight important interactions in your recordings.
feedback.system.title: System Information
feedback.system.capture.label: Screen Capture
library.empty.title: Library is empty
library.empty.description: Start recording or taking screenshots to fill your library
library.detail.title: Details
library.detail.name: Name
library.detail.confirmDeleteRecording: Are you sure you want to delete this recording?
library.detail.confirmDeleteScreenshot: Are you sure you want to delete this screenshot?
setup.welcome.title: Welcome to Cap
setup.welcome.subtitle: Beautiful screen recordings, owned by you.
setup.permissions.title: Permissions Required
setup.permissions.subtitle: Cap needs permissions to run properly.
setup.permissions.screenRecording.descri: Add Cap in System Settings, then restart the app for changes to take effect.
setup.permissions.accessibility.descript: During recording, Cap collects mouse activity locally to generate automatic zoom in segments.
setup.permissions.microphone.description: This permission is required to record audio in your Caps.
setup.permissions.camera.description: This permission is required to record your camera in your Caps.
setup.mode.title: Select Recording Mode
setup.mode.subtitle: Choose how you want to record with Cap. You can change this later.
setup.restart.title: Restart Required
setup.restart.message: After adding Cap in System Settings, you'll need to restart the app for the permission to take effect.
setup.restart.cancel: No, I still need to add it
